text: Mike has a very good job. He works for a small company and usually works from home. Last week he worked a lot. He got a message from his boss, and the boss called him. They talked for 30 minutes about work. Yesterday Mike went to the movies with a friend. They liked the movie. Today Mike stays at home. He has breakfast at 10 and he does not work today. He wants to rest and spend time at home. Tomorrow he will leave for work at 9. He will take a taxi and get to work on time. In the evening he will call his friend and talk about the next weekend.
